dialogue.text: *I can't keep freezing up like this...*
You seem to be struggling with maintaining eye contact.
You would think it would be easy...seeing as how they only have one. Ha!
Many struggle to make eye contact during conversations.
Try to focus on the periphery of my eye.
This way you can avoid noticing that
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]I AM STARING INTO YOUR SOUL[/shake]
Relax, just try to focus on the side of my head.
And when you feel your glance slipping,
Just like clicking a cursor back on target!
